attributes.additional_details:
The Government has passed that medical professionals can intervene with births why can't they now intervene to give a dignified and pain free end of life.

The end of a persons life is as important as the birth so both should be treated the same.

The UK has now become the first country to approve laws to allow the creation of babies from three people.

The modified version of IVF has passed its final legislative obstacle after being approved by the House of Lords.

The fertility regulator will now decide how to license the procedure to prevent babies inheriting deadly genetic diseases.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: legalising euthanasia

Created by: Harry Salisbury

Closing: 30/03/2015
